page.title: 12A typical village schoolday.
page.content: My name is Shersden Miller. My day starts at about 7am when I get up. I wash and change by 8am then have breakfast. After breakfast I set off for school at about quarter to nine. I start school at 9am. After registration there is a short assembly in the school hall. On returning to class I do Maths and English. Break is at 1O.3Oam for quarter of an hour and lunch at 12 until quarter past one. I do not have school dinners I bring my own sandwiches. During the afternoon I might do some lessons in History , Geography ,P.E. ,Art or Craft. School finishes at 3.3Opm. I walk home and on a fine day I go to play with friends. I have tea between 5 and 6. I then play with my sister, read or watch television before going to bed at quarter past nine.
